text: 39|73|Ara yara tadera rabera taka'oya abalambana kareche taderake dale dale jannatera dike niye ya'oya habe. Abasese yakhana tara jannatera kache asabe ebam era darajasamuha khule deya habe ebam jannatera raksira taderake balabe, 'tomadera prati salamaâ€™, tomara bhala chile [1] sutaram jannate prabesa kara sthayibhabe abasthitira jan'ya.
